sourceMeaningMnemonic: Between the <radical>roof</radical> and the <radical>ground</radical> there are <radical>few</radical> <radical>shellfish</radical>. This is because we invited some <kanji>VIP</kanji> <kanji>guest</kanji>s into our home and they ate all our shellfish.
meaningInfo: The VIPs came into our home (the place between our roof and the ground) where they consumed all our shellfish. Only the best for guests, I guess.
readingMnemonic: These <kanji>VIP</kanji> <kanji>guest</kanji>s are part of a <reading>Hin</reading>du (<ja>ひん</ja>) envoy.
readingInfo: We are treating these VIP guests extra special because they represent the whole Hindu religion. They get shellfish because of course we weren't going to serve them beef!
